description: Turkmenistan Avian Influenza Control and Human Pandemic Preparedness and Response Project

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project strengthens Turkmenistan's capacity to prevent the spread of avian influenza among poultry, to prevent the transmission of avian influenza from birds to other animals and humans, and to be prepared for a potential pandemic of avian influenza transmissible between humans.The project activities include capacity building trainings for veterinary  and health care services personnel, refurbishment and equipping national and selected regional veterinary laboratories, procurement and installation of laboratory equipment, procurement of vehicles, equipment, cool boxes, thermobags and desinfectants for wild life surveillance team, vehicles and equipment for national and regional laboratories.
subproject.title: Avian Influenza Prepardness
